Title: Relates to the possession of a rifle, shotgun, or other long gun by a person convicted of a felony or serious offense; repealer
Summary: Increases the penalty for a person convicted of a felony or serious offense for possessing a rifle, shotgun, or other long gun from a misdemeanor to a felony.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the possession of a rifle, shotgun, or other long gun by a person convicted of a felony or serious offense; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
